title: (x) Please ignore
content:
I'm looking for some simple yet effective font software to make my design (Adobe Illustrator) into a real font. About 20 years ago I worked with Fontographer which was quite pleasing, but I suspect it's changed over the years (BTW, I've changed too; from Mac to PC (yes, I know...)). And perhaps there is by now much better software?

Tips anyone?
author: Jean Paul Beumer

comments.content: FontLab's Type Tool is a relatively inexpensive, yet reasonably capable, program...
